abstract: An anchor location at the intermediate tip of the thumb.
overview:
## Discussion

Content anchored this way has its positive y-axis in the direction of the fingernail’s normal and its negative z-axis pointing towards the side where the index finger is.

# thumbIntermediateTip

**Type Property**

An anchor location at the intermediate tip of the thumb.

## Declaration

```swift
static let thumbIntermediateTip: AnchoringComponent.Target.HandLocation.HandJoint
```

## Discussion

Content anchored this way has its positive y-axis in the direction of the fingernail’s normal and its negative z-axis pointing towards the side where the index finger is.
title: thumbIntermediateTip
